item.title: Connecting to a WRT54G with a HP iPAQ 110
item.description: After playing around with settings, I was finally able to access my wireless network with my HP iPAQ 110.

item.title: Review: HP GL313AA#ABA 2-piece USB Speakers
item.description: A review for HP Multimedia Speakers, specifically HP GL313AA#ABA 2-piece USB Speakers.

item.title: Playstation 3 and the HP Pocket Media Drive
item.description: Unfortunately, it doesn't look like it's possible to directly use a HP Pocket Media Drive on a Playstation 3.

item.title: HP media drives - pocket versus personal
item.description: Is there a difference between the HP Personal Media Drives and the HP Pocket Media Drives? There's no easy way to find out currently, so an investigation is in order. [slnet0514:ef50ad8b-f02f-4625-8ff3-df6e4d68f9e2]
